items.summary: Remove the existing 3-tier pricing table section (Professional Free, Enterprise $49/mo, Sovereign $149/mo) from the landing page (LandingPage.tsx)
Create a new Subscriptions page component accessible from the dashboard sidebar, positioned in the navigation menu after Analytics & Vault

Implement two subscription pricing tiers on the Subscriptions page: Basic tier at ₹300/month and Premium tier at ₹500/month, displayed as cards with glassmorphism styling consistent with the existing dashboard design

Differentiate features between Basic (₹300/month) and Premium (₹500/month) tiers based on importance, with Basic tier including essential meeting intelligence features and Premium tier adding advanced security, tactical controls, and priority features
Add Subscribe CTA buttons to both subscription tier cards that display a toast notification indicating the subscription flow is simulated (as Stripe integration is not yet implemented)
